metadata.title: AKS NodePort or LoadBalancer Service Created
metadata.description: Detects creation of NodePort or LoadBalancer services which expose applications externally.

properties.description: Detects when a NodePort or LoadBalancer type service is created, potentially exposing applications to the internet.
properties.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend verb = tostring(log.verb)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| extend requestObject = log.requestObject
| extend user = log.user
| extend responseStatus = log.responseStatus
| where objectRef.resource == "services"
| where verb == "create"
| where responseStatus.code in (200, 201)
| extend
    ServiceType = tostring(requestObject.spec.type),
    ServiceName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace),
    Ports = tostring(requestObject.spec.ports),
    ExternalIPs = tostring(requestObject.spec.externalIPs),
    LoadBalancerIP = tostring(requestObject.spec.loadBalancerIP),
    Username = tostring(user.username),
    ClusterName = Resource
| where ServiceType in ("NodePort", "LoadBalancer")
| where Namespace !in ("kube-system", "gatekeeper-system", "azure-arc", "ingress-nginx")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    ServiceName,
    ServiceType,
    Ports,
    ExternalIPs,
    LoadBalancerIP,
    Username
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, ServiceName, ServiceType, Ports, Username

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: A {{ServiceType}} service '{{ServiceName}}' was created in namespace '{{Namespace}}' by '{{Username}}', potentially exposing the application externally.
